entry.title: EI-2 (lapis/turq brass earrings)
entry.summary:
Vendor: Hamro Village
Type: Earrings
Price: 8.00

Our jewelry reflects the rich art of the Himalayas. This Tibetan style earrings is made of reconstituted turquoise, coral beads and mixed metal. These local materials are endowed with certain meanings. For instance, Turquoise is one of the oldest protection amulets, and was also known as a symbol of wealth in many ancient cultures. 

All our jewellery are created by hand, please accept and appreciate minor imperfect and variation of handmade items. No two items are identical, so every single item you purchase from us is one-of-kind.


Please be aware that actual colors may differ slightly from their appearance on your display, as it depends on your monitor settings.
